cleanDesc: Sparco Universal Steel Side Mounts - Bucket Seats
short-description: Sparco universal side mounts are used to mount aftermarket bucket seats in your vehicle. We recommend pairing these with    and seat bases for optimal results.

cleanDesc: Sparco Universal Sliders
short-description: Sparco sliders allow fore and aft movement of your aftermarket bucket seats. We recommend these for anyone who is going to use their vehicle on the street as well as the track. To be paired with   .

cleanDesc: Seat Floor Adapters - E82, E90, E92 - Macht Schnell
short-description: In order to mount aftermarket seats in your car, you need a floor mount adapter. These high-quality aluminum adapters are made by Macht Schnell. These bolt to your existing seat mounting studs in the floor and offer the lowest profile of any floor mount (22mm height). This helps to keep your seat at the lowest position possible. Your seat adapters or sliders bolt to this adapter plate. These floor mounts are a matrix style with rows of threaded holes that allow you to find an ideal seat location. There are other options - including homemade - but these seat brackets for your BMW are the highest quality to match your expensive seats.   Sold per seat. Can be used on left or ride sides of vehicle.     2008-2012    128i 135i 1M Coupe  2006-2011    325i 325xi 328i 328xi 328i xDrive 330i 330xi 335d 335i 335xi 335i xDrive M3 - Sedan  2006-2012    325xi 328i 328xi 328i xDrive - Wagon  2007-2013    328i 328xi 328i xDrive 335i 335is 335xi 335i xDrive M3 - Coupe

PSDesigns 5-6 Point Anti-Submarine Bracket - Raw Stainless
        ...
short-description: Provides a secure anchor location for your 5 or 6 point harness submarine belts without the need to cut the chassis to install eye bolts. For use with Lightweight style Floor Mounts from VAC, Macht Schnell, PSDesigns Made from extremely strong and durable laser cut 4mm thick 304 Stainless Steel. Features: Compatible with all 5-point and 6-point harnesses Includes all required hardware (2 High tensile Eyebolts, 2 High tensile 7/16 UNF nuts, and 2 High tensile M8 flanged button head allen bolts) Bolt-in installation (bracket bolts under the floor mounts for extra safety) One Bracket required per seat/Harness. PSDesigns is an enthusiast based company that specializes in niche performance upgrades. From intake conversions to handling upgrades, they have innovated and tested in real world environments to bring you high performance components.

cleanDesc: Recaro Specialist M Seat - All BMW
short-description: Upgrading your seat(s) will completely transform your interior feel. The Specialist S includes integrated lumbar support, adjustable headrest, and a mildly bolstered back and seat with thigh extension. A classic design and shape that works well in almost any chassis. Manual adjustment and seat back release.

cleanDesc: Sparco R100 Seat - All BMW
short-description: The simplest way to completely transform the interior feel of your BMW. With manual adjustment and an ergonomically correct backrest.

cleanDesc: OMP Racing Seat Mounting Bracket - E82 E88
short-description: This OMP racing seat mounting bracket is made to specifically to secure a racing seat in your E82 and E88. Using stock mounting points, it eliminates the need to weld or modify your floor in any way. Using stock mounting positions is also safer in that they are proven to hold up by the manufacturer in crash tests when the car is designed. Poorly mounted brackets could cause thin metal to tear, split, or buckle if not properly reinforced, leading directly to injury in critical situations.

cleanDesc: Seat Floor Adapters - E36, E46, E85 - Macht Schnell
short-description: In order to mount aftermarket seats in your car, you need a floor mount adapter. These high-quality aluminum adapters are made by Macht Schnell. These bolt to your existing seat mounting studs in the floor and offer the lowest profile of any floor mount (22mm height). This helps to keep your seat at the lowest position possible. Your seat adapters or sliders bolt to this adapter plate. These floor mounts are a matrix style with rows of threaded holes that allow you to find an ideal seat location. There are other options - including homemade - but these seat brackets for your BMW are the highest quality to match your expensive seats.   Sold per seat. Can be used on left or right sides of vehicle.   These adapters were originally designed for the E46 chassis. They can fit the E36 by modifying the mounting holes to match the bolt and stud locations on the E36 floor.     1995-1999    318i 318is 318ti 318i 323is 323i 325i 325is 325i 328i 328is 328i M3 (except convertibles) (  )  1999-2005    323i 323ci 325i 325ci 325xi 328i 328ci 330i 330ci 330xi M3 (except convertibles)  2003-2008    Z4 2.5i Z4 3.0i Z4 3.0si Z4 M Roadster M Coupe

cleanDesc: Brey Krause R-9292 Seat Mount - Priced Each
short-description: The R-9292 line of seat mounts is the clean, simple, light weight, and strong way to attach your reclining back or bottom mount seats to your factory seat sliders. They are made specifically to fit in a small number of chassis and work with a limit range of seat sizes to create a precise fit with maximum head room.

cleanDesc: Recaro Universal Seat Sliders
short-description: If you want fore-aft adjustment on your Recaro seat you will need a set of sliders. These are the genuine Recaro sliders that are some of the finest quality that we have seen. The sliders fit between the vehicle adapter and the seat brackets. There are two types depending on how your floor adapters work - without tabs and with tabs.   Recaro Seat Slider types -    - offers the lowest possible seating position - the total height of the sliders is 22mm (7/8"); the sliders are sandwiched between the floor mount and seat; the bolts install to the floor mount    to the ground; works with flat Macht Schnell or VAC style floor mounts only.    - the sliders have tabs on each end with three height positions; the positions allow height and rake adjustments but means it's taller than the version without tabs - total height with the tabs is 58mm (2.25"); the tabs mean the mounting bolts install    to the ground; some floor mounts require the tab style (Wedge Engineering for example).   The Recaro sliders are all steel - pulling the handle moves teeth on two tracks which is more secure and stable than a single track. This set of sliders has the bar on the inside of the track (the most common for BMW fitments).   Sold per seat.

cleanDesc: OMP Seat Sliding bracket
short-description: Sliding rail kit to be mounted between the seat mount and the seat.

cleanDesc: Full Back Seat Delete Panels (6 parts) - E36

cleanDesc: Turner Motorsport Roll Bar Clamps - Pair
short-description: These little guys are one of our favorite final touches on a race car build. After years of requests, we now are able to supply these for more than just our race team's use. These aluminum collars bolt on your roll cage's harness bar (or any bar for that matter) and help keep your seat belt harnesses from sliding on the bar. You can use just one pair to accomplish this, or 2 pairs (4 collars total) for the best looking and functioning install. The beauty of these collars (besides being lightweight and looking clean) is that they can be adjusted from side to side, which is convenient if you change you seat or belt configuration. They can also be used for other applications as well, such as taming that helmet net strap. If you're looking for a clean, professional looking solution, these are a superb final touch. As used on our own Championship winning TMS E46 and E90 race cars.      for 1.5" OD roll bar tubing or for 1.75" OD roll bar tubing (choose your size below). Check your cage tubing diameter especially if your car was built in Europe as they used metric tubing sizes. If you need a metric size, contact us. Also measure with paint applied, not bare tubing. These are sold by the pair, so be sure to modifying your quantity below (or in the cart) if you need them for both seats.

HARD Motorsport Rear Seat Bulkhead Delete Panel - BMW E46 Coupe

Fitting most applications, this panel is the closest option to a drop in part you can find. For vehicles with safety cages, only a small bit of modification is necessary for perfect fitment.

cleanDesc: Sparco 600 Series Passenger Seat Base - E36 Coupe
short-description: This is the driver's side seat base used to fit aftermarket bucket seats in your E36 coupe. This seat bracket does have a tab to retain your factory seat belts if you wish - we recommend for people who intend on using their vehicle on the street, but if your vehicle is a dedicated track vehicle, then should suffice.

cleanDesc: Recaro Cross Sportster CS Sport Seat (Heated)
short-description: The Cross Sportster CS seat is everything you wanted in a high quality street tuner seat. This seat doesn't just look cool - it's also a functional ergonomic improvement. The Cross Sportster is similar to the legendary Sportster CS but with smaller hip bolsters to make ingress/egress easier. All of the other features of the Sportster CS carry over - aggressive side bolsters, wide shoulder supports and integrated headrest to properly support and protect your body during spirited driving. This seat also features a heated element in the base (with its own switch) on vinyl and leather materials. Recaro has also focused on comfort by contouring the backrest to the natural shape of the human spine. The padding is thick and dense and the seat cushion has a built-in shock absorbing design. This seat will accept a standard 3-point seatbelt as well as a 4-point harness. The backrest folds forward for easy access to rear seats in a coupe body.   Feedback from a Sportster CS user:

cleanDesc: Sabelt Titan FIA Approved Racing Seat
short-description: Sabelt's Titan seat is a more traditional and less aggressive design that makes it at home on the street as well as the track. Easy to get in and out of, this seat makes a perfect addition to the occasional track car or double-duty weekend warrior.

cleanDesc: Driver Side VAC Floor Mount Adapter - E36/E46
short-description: The Original and best; VAC's CAD designed, thoroughly tested and CNC machined Billet Aluminum Floor Mount Adapters have been a best seller for years. Their FMA's allow the lowest and cleanest install of any seat brackets available. Hands down the best floor mount adapters available for your BMW, where form follows function. A lightweight and improved design is a reflection of their commitment to offer the highest quality components available. While other copy-cat designs sacrifice weight, aesthetics, and driver/pasenger specific install to be cheap, VAC's original FMA's allow you the perfect amount of adjustment for nearly any seat install without being cumbersome, heavy, or unsightly. Now, our FMAs are more affordable than ever! Allows easy install for nearly all: Momo, Sparco, OMP, Status, Racetech, Recaro, Cobra, Kirkey, Bride, Sabelt, Corbeau and most other racing / sports seats Adapts side mount seat brackets to the factory floor mounting points (our VAC mounts highly recommended) Lightweight, strong and aesthetically pleasing design Fully compatible with sliders Kit comes complete with all hardware needed Made from Aerospace quality 6061-T6 Billet Aluminum If you are installing 5 or 6 point harnesses; mount your eye-bolts right to our anti-sub mounting bracket. No more scraping, drilling or welding the floor pan. What do these allow me to use? These Floor Mount Adapters allow you to mount Side Mounts from race seats, or Seat Sliders such as Sparco, Momo, or VAC brand. They do not allow factory seats or bottom mount seats to directly attach. VAC Tech Tip: We strongly recommend adding VAC's Superior Side Mount Adapters or purchasing them in together in our discounted Race Seat Installation Kit: They tend to fit much better than the seat manufactures side mounts in the tight floor pan and help you center your seat to the steering wheel.

cleanDesc: Seat Shims - Macht Schnell Seat Shim Set
short-description: Often when installing race seats there is a gap between your seat shell to your side brackets. Or maybe you want to shim your seat to one side for a better driving position. These aluminum spacer shims are the perfect solution. They come in a satin black anodize for a stealthy look and include longer hardware in a handy low-profile rounded head. Included in this set: 2 x 14mm shims with correct extended bolts 4 x 9mm shims with correct extended bolts 2 x 5mm shims with correct extended bolts 4 x washers These are the ideal finishing touch to your seat install and the preferred method instead of using unsightly washers.

cleanDesc: OMP Racing Seat Mounting Bracket - E46 Sedan
short-description: This OMP racing seat mounting bracket is made to specifically to secure a racing seat in your E46 Sedan. Using stock mounting points, it eliminates the need to weld or modify your floor in any way. Using stock mounting positions is also safer in that they are proven to hold up by the manufacturer in crash tests when the car is designed. Poorly mounted brackets could cause thin metal to tear, split, or buckle if not properly reinforced, leading directly to injury in critical situations.

cleanDesc: OMP Racing Seat Leg Cushion | Black
short-description: If additional leg support is needed for those extra long days in the racing seat, OMP offers the Racing Seat Leg Cushion. cleanDesc: OMP TRS-E: Tubular Racing Seat | Black
short-description: This is an OMP performance TRS-E tubular racing seat. The seat internal frame is tubular steel and the entire seat upholstery is velour material. Tubular steel ensures strength and protection and the velour adds to the comfort of the seat. The leg pad is removable for a more individual fit. The large shoulder harness slots allow for a variety of driver heights.

cleanDesc: OMP Racing Seat Base Cushion | Black
short-description: Racing seats can become uncomfortable as the thin padding of the seat begins to compress. If you're planning on sitting in the seat for any extended periods of time, a base cushion is the perfect addition. This OMP seat cushion is 1.5" of firm, but comfortable and supportive, foam that attaches to the velour seat fabric using Velcro strips. The seat cushion is covered in black velour fabric that is flame-retardant and has an OMP logo embroidered in the center. The cushion is 13" long and 11" wide.

cleanDesc: Trunk Delete Panel - E36

cleanDesc: Recaro Ergomed ES Seat - All BMW
short-description: This seat privides a way to upgrade your seating without losing any features. Power adjustment, pneumatic lumbar and heat/cool functions ensure your complete and total comfort.

cleanDesc: Recaro Side Seat Mounts- FIA Approved
short-description: Racing and aftermarket seats require a mount to afix the seat to the chassis of the car. Most Recaro seats are 'side-mount' which means the brackets attach to the side of the seat and then turn 90 degrees to mount to the floor (or sliders). These are genuine Recaro side mounts that are FIA-certified for optimum safety and security. Many racing organizations require an FIA-approved mount. Sold as a pair with hardware included. Choose from standard steel or light weigt aluminum. Choose from Steel or aluminum above. We recommend aluminum to those who are trying to save weight in their build.

cleanDesc: BMW E90 To F80 Rear Seat Retrofit
short-description: This rear seat kit is tailored to allow install of the F80 rear seats into E90. Currently has only been tested using M3 interior but should suit any F80 rear seat. Only compatible with fold down rear seats. Install doc to come. All components are 6061 Construction Anodized Black

cleanDesc: Lumbar Cushion

short-description: The simplest way to completely transform the interior feel of your BMW. With manual adjustment and an ergonomically correct backrest.

cleanDesc: RKP Rear Seat Delete - F87 M2
short-description: Shed valuable weight with this rear seat delete for your M2. This delete kit flows seamlessly with the factory interior, allowing you to save weight without sacrificing the integrity of your beautiful interior.

cleanDesc: Recaro Pro Racer SPA Flexible Adapter Mounts And Sliders
short-description: The Recaro Flexible Adaptor seat mounts are the most robust and stout slider mounts we have seen. The Flexible Adapter mounts are a reinforced side mount + slider assembly intended for pro endurance racing. These are the first FIA-certified seat sliders. They have extra reinforcing braces on the front and rear which takes away a lot of the lateral motion from traditional un-reinforced side mount brackets. As racecars see more lateral loading from high downforce and stickier tires the seat naturally wants to flex even more. This extra strength seat slider/mount combination is just the thing to keep you planted in place. Even the slider hand bar is overbuilt and bright red for to grab your attention. These have been designed by Recaro specifically for endurance races where driver changes need to be done in seconds.   This slider + mount system only works with the Recaro Pro Racer SPA/SPG seats. Choose from the standard size or XL version.

cleanDesc: Sabelt Titan Carbon Fiber FIA Approved Racing Seat
short-description: Sabelt's Titan seat is a more traditional and less aggressive design that makes it at home on the street as well as the track. This particular version is made from extremely lightweight and durable carbon fiber. Easy to get in and out of, this seat makes a perfect addition to the occasional track car or double-duty weekend warrior.

OMP Racing Seat Lumbar Cushion | Medium - Black
short-description: If additional lower back support is needed for those extra long days in the racing seat, OMP offers the Racing Seat Lumbar Cushion. Measuring in at 10" by 8" by 3", it is fastened to the velour fabric of the seat with Velcro strips, it can be adjusted to exactly where you need it. The pad itself is covered with the same velour flame-retardant material as the seat and is embroidered with an OMP logo.

cleanDesc: Seatbelt 6-point Race Harness Receptacles - Macht Schnell
short-description: Many racing series and event organizers are requiring 5 or 6-point harnesses in their events now. Attaching the anchor points to the seat base is a desired alternative to drilling holes in your floor and carpet*. This set includes the 6-point anchor to attach to the Macht Schnell floor mount as well as side attachments for either a bolt-in or snap-in harness.   * - note that most racing harness manufacturers will advise that drilling through the floor is the best method for mounting harnesses. This allows you to locate the mount in the ideal location and angle to fit your driving position. The proper installation is paramount to ensure the harness works correctly in an impact. cleanDesc: OMP RS-P.T. 2: Fiberglass Racing Seat | Black
short-description: This is an OMP performance RS-PT2 Fiberglass racing seat. The seat internal frame is fiberglass and the entire seat upholstery is velour material. Fiberglass gives strength and light weight and the velour adds to the comfort of the seat. The main backrest pads and leg pad are both exchangeable with different sized pads for a more custom fit. The large shoulder harness slots allow for a variety of driver heights.

cleanDesc: OMP WRC-R CARBON: Carbon Fiber Racing Seat | Black
short-description: This is an OMP performance "WRC-R Carbon" carbon fiber racing seat. The seat shell is autoclave molded carbon fiber and the seat upholstery is velour and Airtex material. Carbon fiber gives strength and light weight and the Airtex increases breathability of the seat. The main backrest pads and leg pad are both exchangeable with different sized pads for a more custom fit. The large shoulder harness slots allow for a variety of driver heights.

cleanDesc: OMP HTE-R XL Fiberglass Racing Seat -- Black

cleanDesc: OMP Racing Seat Mounting Bracket - E36 Sedan
short-description: This OMP racing seat mounting bracket is made to specifically to secure a racing seat in your E36 Sedan. Using stock mounting points, it eliminates the need to weld or modify your floor in any way. Using stock mounting positions is also safer in that they are proven to hold up by the manufacturer in crash tests when the car is designed. Poorly mounted brackets could cause thin metal to tear, split, or buckle if not properly reinforced, leading directly to injury in critical situations.

cleanDesc: OMP TRS-E XL: Tubolar Racing Seat | Black

The large shoulder harness slots allow for a variety of driver heights.
